subject: Psychology
title: Digital Mental Health
description: Learn Digital Mental Health in one minute.

hook.text: A therapy app on your phone delivers CBT at 2am when no therapist is available. Mental health goes digital.

buildup.text: Digital mental health includes therapy apps, AI chatbots, online counseling, and wearable mood trackers.

discovery.text: Research shows digital CBT can be as effective as face-to-face therapy for mild to moderate depression.

twist.text: Access improves, but concerns about privacy, data security, and the loss of human connection remain serious.

climax.text: Technology won't replace therapists. But it can reach millions who would never walk into a therapist's office.

punchline.text: Therapy at 2am in your pocket. That's the new frontier.

quiz.question: What has research shown about digital CBT?
options: It can be as effective as face-to-face therapy for mild depression
It is always superior to in-person therapy
Digital therapy has no measurable effect
